Articles.Content:
Love the forum, but my eyes don't love the white background. especially when viewing on tablet at night. Do you guys have a dark-style skin you could use with a dark gray background? Either that, or has anyone produced a stylish skin for it?

thanks!
Don't think there's one at the moment. Since there's a forum update coming up soon, it might have to wait till after that.

i'd like to resurrect this since the forum update has happened. I'd love to see a reverse skin that has a dark background with white/light text. Viewing at night is harsh with all of the white background. I'd recommend a dark gray myself.

Humm, we have a lot of skin modifications, and skins usually cost money for vBulletin. One easy option I guess would be to user a browser plugin like Stylish (availble for Firefox and Chrome): https://userstyles.org/stylish/ which allows you to run your own custom skin: https://userstyles.org/styles/22383/anandtech-vb-dark-theme

Then I guess I need to figure out how to edit/create these.

The other thing that a forum-based option would help with is on mobile platforms. Google Chrome on android doesn't support stylish that I've found...

Edited October 17, 2014 by SHaFT7
